com.spatial4j.core.io.jts

Class JtsBinaryCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spatial4j.core.io.BinaryCodec
      • com.spatial4j.core.io.jts.JtsBinaryCodec

  • public class JtsBinaryCodec
extends BinaryCodec
    Writes shapes in WKB, if it isn't otherwise supported by the superclass.
